title: Lust Theory - Season 1
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Lust Theory is an adult Visual Novel in which you take control of a 20 year old guy whose life is turned up side down when he finds out that the same day is repeating. The game is packed with sex, humor, romance, drama and mystery.
